home.title: Welcome
home.message1: After some wonderful years together and many adventures,
home.message1b: we decided it was time to make it official :-)
home.message2: And what better way to celebrate than with you, next summer, in the heart of the countryside?

address.title: The Dream Venue
address.access: Accessible by car, on foot or by bike:
address.trainInfo: If you wish to come by train and need transport, it would be very wise to let us know ;).

info.title: Practical Information
info.dress: Attire: elegant and comfortable with a touch of your favorite color
info.dietary: (**) please let us know about allergies, intolerances or special diets. We love good food and celebration!

accommodations.title: Accommodations
accommodations.camping: Camping (with amenities) is available on site.
accommodations.online: Otherwise, booking.com and Airbnb are your friends.
accommodations.backup: We also have some backup plans, if there's a problem please contact us.

gallery.title: Photos
gallery.caption1: Our venue, a place full of stories... To be completed together!
gallery.caption2: Where it all began, last summer

login.title: Protected Access
login.message: Please enter the password to access the site.
